subject: BMW AUTOMOBILE COMPANY.
body:
BMW AUTOMOBILE COMPANY.
Dear Online Lottery Winner
The Board of Directors, members of staff and the International Awareness
Promotion Department of the BMW AUTOMOBILE PROMOTION congratulate you
your success as one of our TEN(10) STAR PRIZE WINNER in last year'
International Awareness Promotion (IAP) 2022 held in USA.
Your email address was randomly selected along with nine others from a
database of over 1,000,000 email addresses drawn from the WORLD-WIDE-WEB.
This makes you the proud owner cash prize of ($5,000,000.00) five
million United State dollar and BMW 6XCar.
Agents in charge :William Rogers
email:williamrogers4759@gmail.com
Winning Parameters:
TICKET NO: 8603657824738
REF NO: 220-86957
BATCH NO: 2011MTL-03
Also provide listed information below for the payment of this Winning prize
Names==================
Address=================
Age=====================
Sex=====================
Occupation===============
Phone no================
Country=================
Copy of your valid ID
 =======
Please you are to provide him with the above listed details as soon as possible
so he can begin with the processing of your prize winnings.
Congratulations once
again from all our staffs and the director of BMW AUTOMOBILE lottery
Yours Sincerely
Dr. William Rogers
Award Notification Team.

subject: Re: BMW AUTOMOBILE COMPANY.
body:
Hello Dr. William Rogers,

Wow, this is such exciting news! I can't believe I'm one of the lucky winners. I've always admired BMW cars and now to think that I might own one is just incredible.

I do have a few questions though, if you don't mind. Could you please explain a bit more about how my email was selected? And what exactly does the Awareness Promotion Department do? 

Also, could you tell me more about this BMW car that's part of the prize? What model is it? Is it new or used?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Raymond
